name: yaml-cpp-static

about.summary: yaml-cpp is a YAML parser and emitter in C++ matching the YAML 1.2 spec.
yaml-cpp is a YAML parser and emitter in C++ matching the YAML 1.2 spec.

raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  version: "0.8.0"

recipe:
  name: yaml-cpp-split
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/jbeder/yaml-cpp/archive/refs/tags/${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: fbe74bbdcee21d656715688706da3c8becfd946d92cd44705cc6098bb23b3a16

build:
  number: 0

outputs:
  - package:
      name: yaml-cpp
    build:
      script:
        file: ${{ "build-lib.sh" if unix else "build-lib.bat" }}
    requirements:
      build:
        - ${{ compiler('c') }}
        - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
        - cmake <4
        - ninja
      run_exports:
        - ${{ pin_subpackage('yaml-cpp', upper_bound='x.x') }}

    tests:
      - package_contents:
          lib:
            - yaml-cpp
          files:
            - "**/cmake/yaml-cpp/yaml-cpp-config.cmake"
      - script:
          - if: unix
            then:
              - test ! -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libyaml-cpp.a"
              - cmake -G Ninja -S test/ -B build-test/ ${CMAKE_ARGS}
            else:
              - cmake -G Ninja -S test/ -B build-test/ %CMAKE_ARGS%
          - cmake --build build-test/
          - cmake --build build-test/ --target test
        requirements:
          build:
            - ${{ compiler('c') }}
            - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
            - cmake <4
            - ninja
        files:
          recipe:
            - test/

  - package:
      name: yaml-cpp-static
    build:
      script:
        file: ${{ "build-lib.sh" if unix else "build-lib.bat" }}

    requirements:
      build:
        - ${{ compiler('c') }}
        - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
        - cmake <4
        - ninja
      run_constraints:
        - yaml-cpp <0

    tests:
      - package_contents:
          lib:
            - ${{ "libyaml-cpp.a" if unix }}
            - ${{ "yaml-cpp.lib" if win }}
          files:
            - "**/cmake/yaml-cpp/yaml-cpp-config.cmake"
      - script:
          - if: unix
            then:
              - test ! -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libyaml-cpp${SHLIB_EXT}"
              - cmake -G Ninja -S test/ -B build-test/ ${CMAKE_ARGS}
            else:
              - cmake -G Ninja -S test/ -B build-test/ %CMAKE_ARGS%
          - cmake --build build-test/
          - cmake --build build-test/ --target test
        requirements:
          build:
            - ${{ compiler('c') }}
            - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
            - cmake <4
            - ninja

        files:
          recipe:
            - test/

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/jbeder/yaml-cpp
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: yaml-cpp is a YAML parser and emitter in C++ matching the YAML 1.2 spec.
  documentation: https://github.com/jbeder/yaml-cpp/wiki/Tutorial
  repository: https://github.com/jbeder/yaml-cpp

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - AntoinePrv
    - JohanMabille
    - allanleal
    - marcelotrevisani
    - seanyen
    - tadeu
    - wolfv
